amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to supporting trade and travel at ports of entry.

vote.text: Amendment SA 639 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 639 proposed by Senator Peters. (consideration: CR S1965-1966; text: CR S1966) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to supporting trade and travel at ports of entry.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 639 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 639 proposed by Senator Peters.
